page.title: 12LOCAL HISTORY 2 (cont.)
page.content: { {OUR WORKING WELL} ________________ The stately well standing straight and dignified, His impressive black coat and eye catching golden face stand out against the school building, His ears, behind his golden mane, prick up, as piercing shouts echo around the playground. Impatient villagers gather around as the first drop of water for many years falls from his spout, He stands proud in his new site, guarding the building. Pensioners remember their childhood days when they see his long forgotten face, Basking in the care and attention which he is now receiving. {ELAINE AITKEN. }
